bibl.title: Little Emperors.
bibl.note: Four terracotta statuettes of emperors from Egypt in the British Museum. - 1. Inv. GR 1983.7-23.1. - 2. Inv. GR 1925.11-20.17. - 3. Inv. GR 1843.5-7.1039. - 4. Inv. EA 1882.11-27.162 (37571).

bibl.title: Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993

bibl.seg: Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 207-213, 4 figg.
Four terracotta statuettes of emperors from Egypt in the British Museum. - 1. Inv. GR 1983.7-23.1. - 2. Inv. GR 1925.11-20.17. - 3. Inv. GR 1843.5-7.1039. - 4. Inv. EA 1882.11-27.162 (37571).
